name: Swim for Life: 2022 to current
description: This dataset contains the location and attendance information for the NYC Parks Swim For Life program, an instructional swimming program which serves second grade public school students in NYC. The program runs during the school year, starting in October and concluding in June. This dataset contains Swim for Life program information from 2022 onwards. Explore the Data Dictionary View Open Data for Swim for Life data (2016 to 2020): here Learn more about this program on the NYC Parks website: Swim For Life Note: Swim for Life program was on pause due to COVID-19 pandemic. The program resumed Spring 2022.

name: 2016 - 2017 Arts Survey data

name: Citywide Mobility Survey - July 2020
description: In 2020, NYC DOT conducted a panel survey of respondents who completed the 2019 CMS. The three surveys allowed the agency to better understand how residents traveled and used public spaces during the stay-at-home period and reopening phases of the pandemic. This is the second panel survey that was fielded from July 16 – July 31, 2020.

name: Pedestrian Ramp - Program Progress
description:
New York City Department of Transportation (NYC DOT) has developed a program dedicated to upgrading and installing pedestrian ramps and is committed to making our pedestrian space safe and accessible for all road users.

The term corner refers to intersection corners (space on the sidewalk at the intersection of two streets), midblocks (a crossing that is not at an intersection, usually in between two streets), tops of T-shaped intersections, medians or islands (a small section of raised concrete in the street). A corner can have one or more ramps.
Dataset used to generate the Program Progress Map on the Pedestrian Ramp Program Website: https://www.nycpedramps.info/program-progress

name: Asset Management Executive Summary - State of Good Repair Needs (Expense)
description: This dataset contains information for a select number of agencies. It shows the estimated spending necessary to preserve the structural integrity for each of their fixed assets which meet the criteria for expense eligibility. The numbers can be summarized by Agency to match the Asset Management Executive Summary publication. Amounts are rounded to the nearest thousand. The dataset is updated once a year.
agency: Mayor's Office of Management and Budget (OMB)

name: Where the Dollar Comes From and Goes To
description: This dataset shows where the dollar comes from and goes to in the budget. Data is reported in dollars and updated annually.
agency: Mayor's Office of Management and Budget (OMB)

name: Competitive Sealed Bid Cycle Time by Agency and Fiscal Year
description: Citywide Median Cycle Time (days) for Competitive Sealed Bids from the pre-solicitation ACCO signature date to the sent to Comptroller date.

name: Historical DVS Client Requests Received and Processed
description: The dataset includes the information gathered and reported in the DVS Services Report as specified by Local Law 44 of 2018. The data gathered derived from two separate databases. Assistance requests for services, care, or resources supported via phone, in-person, postal mail or electronic mail. Assistance and support involve connecting City veterans and their families to a coordinated network of public, private and non-profit organizations.

name: NYCgov Poverty Measure Data (2017)
description: American Community Survey Public Use Micro Sample, augmented by NYC Opportunity.

name: FY2015 MMR Agency Performance Indicators
description:
NYC agency performance indicators from the Mayor's Management Report (MMR)

name: 2019 Fall Admissions LL1486
description: In Response to Local Law No. 1486-A.  Reports on school applications, offers of admission, enrollment, and school seats available.   All available seats, applicants, and offers of admissions are for Main Round (for pre-K, Kindergarten, Middle School and High School) admissions only.   Data is only included for schools that participate in centralized admissions processes.

name: Midday Trips
description: List of daily field trip destinations for a month along with number of trips and number of vehicles.
